> "We have to take advantage of this quiet time to rebuild our ranks and, to
> up grade my body"said cooly Hydras"I need a Major Improvement" said the
> Predacon leader by comlink meet me in the throne Room

"Yes sir." came Cyclonus' reply over the same communication link.

When Hydras came out to the  throne room, much like the rest of the
base, it appears to have been repaired completely. None of the
original battle scars remain, the walls are completely smooth and back
to their familiar colors. In fact a few new weapon mounts have been
installed for Hydras' pleasure.

Screens sit above the throne, turned in such a way that only those
sitting on the throne or standing next to it could see them. Also new
shield generators, so that whomever sat on the throne could be
protected.

A few moments go by until the door buzzed to the throne room, it was
Cyclonus requesting entrance.

(TAG)

Preston
